reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress comfortable and good value for money, with one noting it's perfect for a wedding. The dress receives positive feedback for its elegance and quality, though opinions on material quality are mixed, with some praising the fabric while others find it poor. The fit and sizing receive mixed reviews - while some find it nice, others say it doesn't match the size indicated, and while some find it fla

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent quality/value, elegant & stylish
items.body: I’m 5’7” 122 lbs. It fits true to size. Bought it for a Photoshoot, medium was too large. Made the mistake of reading reviews that said to size up. Nope, buy your true size. As you can see in my photos. The flow is amazing. Slit for leg great. Tailoring is impressive. 100% value for money. Ordering it in more colors in size small Read more
items.author: Gweneth Lee

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Black is Beautiful
items.body: Elegant and sized just right for the homecoming event. Borderline basic for any occasion but easy to bling with pearls and sparkles and diamond earrings- a fabulous fit Read more
items.author: QueenVictoria

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars 2nd time was NOT the charm!!!
items.body: This is the 2nd dress (it was a replacement for the damaged dress I received). Disappointed is beyond what I feel at the moment. AGAIN, I was sent another USED and DIRTY dress. This time, the residue from a womans deodorant is in the arm pit area. I did NOT ask for a used dress, so why I keep getting them is beyond me. I have another dress similar to this on the way in blue. I pray it's not another used and dirty dress. The blue dress will be the very last time I'll give them a chance. Oh, and I found someone's hair on it. UGH! The white paper is just to show the hair. Read more
items.author: AgentV83

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good buy, but runs small
items.body: Is well constructed. And the design is good. I think it runs small, however. I wear Size 1X But it was way too tight. So, if a person wears a size 1x, they probably should order a size 2x. I will not exchange this because I don't trust the sizing. Read more
items.author: Missin

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Elegant
items.body: This dress is very elegant and special. I had to return it because it just wasn’t me. Buy true to size. Read more
items.author: Alice

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Nice for the price updated: I returned the item.
items.body: Update: I returned the item for two reasons. The main reason was on the 2nd time I tried the dress on I noticed black "dye" on my hands. It was as if the color from the material was rubbing off. I was discouraged as I really wanted to like this. The second reason was the fit of the neckline. It is not round as pictured, but a poor mock turtleneck that does not look as elegant as the dress could be. For these 2 main reasons, I sadly returned it. I just could not deal with black dye coming off the material. I ordered up a size. Perfect fit. It's body hugging. Not sheer. Nice main material. Very staticy though. Not sure how I can fix that. Suggest wearing all in one underneath as every line will show. My only complaint, if you will...is this neckline. It's weird. Hangs poorly. Looks cheap. If I keep the dress for the black tie affair I have pending, I'll have to have that fixed. I have to drop it to 4* for that. A close 3.5. but...it was under $60. Has a back zip. The slit is not along the side (hip down) but the side front. Better for me but...just a note, not as pictured. Nice for the $ but not worth more. Read more
items.author: M Cook

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this dress.
items.body: Beautiful fit and very comfortable. Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 2.0 out of 5 stars Pretty Dress, But I suppose they didn’t want me to launder it?
items.body: I have mixed feelings about this order. First, the dress is absolutely stunning. It fits beautifully and is very comfortable. Now on to my concerns… upon opening the package, I noticed right away that there are light grey/white marks in a few spots and it’s *extremely* wrinkled. It looks very much like it was a return that someone wore and got deodorant marks all over and then stuffed it back in the bag to return. I checked for a tag- but there’s no tag anywhere along any of the dress seams telling me how to launder it (the Amazon listing says hand wash only and says nothing about ironing). Okay, so I hand wash it and hang it to dry but it’s STILL wrinkly!! I can’t wear this dress like this and I’m potentially going to ruin it by taking an iron to it. That’s a lot of BS for a dress that cost me over $50 and took me almost a week to get. And with shipping times taking so long, I can’t return it and have another dress in time. I’m not thrilled. Read more
items.author: Customer

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Formal High Split Maxi Split Evening is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Formal High Split Maxi Split Evening is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Dark Green, Red, Navy, Wine Red, White, Blue, Yellow, Rose, Black. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
